get_path(dir_path[, search_prefix, counting_format, ...])

supersolids.helper.get_path.get_path(dir_path, search_prefix='movie', counting_format='%03d', file_pattern='', take_last=1, host=None)[source]

Looks up all directories with matching dir_name and counting format in dir_path. Gets the highest number and returns a path with dir_name counted one up (prevents colliding with old data).

Parameters

  • dir_path (pathlib.Path) – Path where to look for old directories (movie data)

  • search_prefix (str) – General name of the directories without the counter

  • counting_format (Optional[str]) – Format of counter of the directories

  • file_pattern (str) –

  • take_last (int) –

Return type

Tuple[Optional[pathlib.Path], Optional[int], str, str]

:param file_pattern : File extension to search for e.g. “.npz”.

:param take_last : Index of list of path counted from behind.

Returns

Path for the new directory (not colliding with old data)

Parameters

  • dir_path (pathlib.Path) –

  • search_prefix (str) –

  • counting_format (Optional[str]) –

  • file_pattern (str) –

  • take_last (int) –

Return type

Tuple[Optional[pathlib.Path], Optional[int], str, str]
